segments.text: I observe the scene carefully, taking it all in.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman stands by the sink, absorbed in drying.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Unbeknownst to her, water overflows dramatically.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's flooding the counter and floor below.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children, meanwhile, raid the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister waits below, hand extended.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Their mischief is endearing yet foolish.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside remains untouched by this drama.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a pang of worry for their safety.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This could end in tears or worse.
segments.speaker: PAR
